trans-unit.source: Specifies the a time compression to use to group data by time. This applies only to some queries. Leave this field blank to not compress data at all. This value is a timestamp (https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-explorer/kusto/query/scalar-data-types/timespan).

Lasciare questo campo vuoto per non comprimere affatto i dati. Questo valore è un timestamp (https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-explorer/kusto/query/scalar-data-types/timespan).
